table.comment: Table to link ingredient to dishes. 1 dish can have many ingredients and 1 ingredient can be in many dishes
Table to link steps to dishes. 1 dish can have many steps and 1 step can be in many dishes and repeated in 1 dish

column.comment: User identifier of whom was the role given to
Identifier of the role that was given to user
When was the role given to user
Dish estimated time for preparation in minutes
Dish identifier to know which dish to link the step
Step identifier to know which step to link
Step number to know what position is this step in the dish recipe
Step estimated time for preparation in minutes
Is the user allowed to edit contents of the group
User ID of this voting creator
